name: Sit Back And Watch Numbers Go Up Simulator
name_original: Sit Back And Watch Numbers Go Up Simulator
description:
This is a game I put together in about 5 minutes.

How do I play?

To get more numbers, simply waste time. The more time you waste, the more numbers you will have. Tired of wasting time? click the FASTER! button to get more numbers par second. But, it will cost you some numbers.

What can I do with all my numbers?

Nothing.

What's the point???

There is no point.

This game is rated "A0" by the ETech Age Rating Index(EARI). It is suitable for ages 0 and up.
